title: Av Avdeevka Directive Russian Army Sheled Oleksandropil, Ceramic, Novobakhmutivka, Semenivka of the Donetsk region. Avi Russians ...
content: At Avdiyivka direction Russian army shelled Oleksandropil, Keramik, Novobakhmutivka, Semenivka of Donetsk region. Russian aviation conducted airstrikes at Ocheretyne and Novokalynove of Donetsk region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
